title: Game won't connect
body:
Open client. 
"we're unable to log you in because you may be offline"

Everything else works fine online. Run as admin didn't work. Restart router didn't work. Restart computer didn't work. Gf PC lol client won't connect. Anyone else's working?

replies.body: I'm not noticing any widespread server issues at the moment so this might be related to how your connection is being routed to our servers by your ISP, or possibly just some accidentally altered network settings. Check up on your settings really quickly using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource, but let me know if that doesn't seem to help much.
